import { Meta, Story, Props, Preview } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import Spinner from '..';

<Meta title="Components/Spinner" />

<Story name="Import" />

# Spinner

Spinners indicate progress in a circular fashion, they're great for ongoing operations.

## Import

```jsx
import { Spinner } from '@qnt/ui';
```

<Story name="Props" />

## Props

<Props of={Spinner} />

## Usage

### Default

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="Default">
    <>
      <Spinner />
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>

### size

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="size">
    <>
      <Spinner size={20}/>
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>

### variant

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="variant">
    <>
      <Spinner size={20}/>
      <Spinner size={30} variant="primary"/>
      <Spinner size={40} variant="success"/>
      <Spinner size={50} variant="warning"/>
      <Spinner size={60} variant="danger"/>
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>
